resources.string: There are no members to display.
Enter at least 5 digits that you will remember. A passkey is a secret number you will enter to open Ledger Link at every meeting.
All rights reserved. Not liable for any damage incurred from use of this software.
Values for this past meeting can not be modified at this time. Meeting is read only.
This past fine payment cannot be undone or modified at this time.
You have issued loans for this meeting. Due dates are calculated based on the date loans were issued. All due dates for these loans will be changed if you change the meeting date.
If a payment is NOT due and no payment is made, press cancel. If a payment is due but not made enter 0 (zero) for payment amount. After entering payment, review new balance.
Review new balance and edit interest and next payment date if necessary.
Changing the interest added will change the interest rate for the loan. Changing the date due will change how often payments must be made for the life of the loan.
To recover your data, kindly fill in the following information
Check box to indicate paid. Swipe to delete.
Tap [Begin] to begin a new meeting.
You may not edit, but you may review before sending.
There are several unsent meetings. It is not safe to keep meetings without sending! Please send every week.
When is the due date of the outstanding welfare
Select type of fine and the amount. Check the box if the member has paid.
What does this member do to make money?
This member’s information was added on 3 Mar 2013 after the cycle started. Here are his total savings and outstanding loans on that day.
Total amount this member has saved during current cycle so far
Actual amount if the original total savings was incorrect (you may enter a correction once)
Actual amount if the original total welfare was incorrect (you may enter a correction once)
Total outstanding welfare borrowed by this member during current cycle
Actual amount if the original total outstanding welfare was incorrect (you may enter a correction once)
Actual amount if the original was incorrect (you may enter a correction once)
Select the member below that would like to borrow from Welfare
View the date below and tap to change if it is not the correct meeting date.
Place the CSV file containing the VSLA Data on to the phone storage. Ensure it is named: vslaMigrationInfo.csv then tap the button below.
To recover your data, kindly fill in the following information
To reset your passkey, kindly fill in the following information
Are you sure you want to delete this meeting? If so, tap [Done]. The following information will be deleted:
If your cycle has ended, enter the share out date.
If you are satisfied that all information is correct, please press done, otherwise press back to revise information
Before the first meeting, enter the current cycle’s information such as the star (share) value, and the names, ages, and occupations for each member.
Review and confirm that all information is correct. Press the member’s name to correct an entry. If you wish to review it later, you may exit and come back later.
You have more than one active cycle. Please choose the cycle for the new meeting.
View the date below and tap to change if it is not the correct meeting date. (You may not pick a date in the future.) When it is correct, tap the arrow above to begin the meeting.
Select the member below to add a fine.
If current cycle has started, and your group has held one or more meetings already, enter current totals for member so far.
Total amount this member has saved in current cycle so far
Total welfare saved by this member during current cycle so far
Total outstanding welfare borrowed by this member during current cycle
When is the due date of the outstanding welfare
Loan number for this member\'s regular loan outstanding
Total amount of this member\'s regular loan outstanding
When is the next repayment expected for this loan
The following are your application results
Enter all cycle information then select next.
Amount that it costs to buy one share
Maximum number of stars (shares) a member may purchase per meeting
This information was added on 3 Mar 2013 after the cycle started. Here are the interest and fines collected by that day.
Total amount of interest collected during current cycle so far
Actual amount of interest collected this cycle so far if the original interest was incorrect (you may enter a correction once)
Total amount of fines collected during current cycle so far
Actual amount of fines collected this cycle so far if the original fines amount was incorrect (you may enter a correction once)
Actual outstanding bank loan in this cycle if the original bank loan amount was incorrect (you may enter a correction once)
Total amount of interest collected this cycle so far.
Total amount of fines collected so far
Update register by adding new members and removing those who are no longer a part of your group.
Select the Meeting whose data you want to send.
Kindly select the training module you have received
If you will take some of the Total Cash in Box to the bank after the meeting, enter the amount. It will then be subtracted from the Expected Starting Cash for your next meeting.
If you will take some of the Total Cash in Box to the bank after the meeting for payment of a loan, enter the amount. It will then be subtracted from the Expected Starting Cash for your next meeting.
Review fines. Tap member name to edit fines or mark as paid.
Tap box to tick member as present. Leave boxes empty for absent members. Press and hold name to add comment.
You may not edit, but you may review before sending.
The Pass Keys do not match.
Registration failed while writing retrieved VSLA Name on the local database. Try again later.
Registration failed due to internet connection problems. Try again later.
Registration failed due to invalid Data Format. Try again later.
No internet connection could be established. Data recovery requires an internet connection
The passkey should be atleast 5 digits long
Set the outstanding welfare due date
The Fine Amount must be positive.
Set the outstanding welfare due date
If cycle has started, and your group has held one or more meetings already, enter current totals for member so far.
This member’s information was added after the cycle started. Here are
total savings and outstanding loans on that day.
This member\’s information was added on
The new member was added successfully.
The new member was added successfully. Add another member.
A problem occurred while adding the new member.
At least one other name is required.
The cycles completed field is required.
The number of completed cycles is too high.
Total Amount this Member has Saved in Current Cycle so far should be zero and above.
Total Amount of this Member\'s outstanding welfare should be zero and above.
The outstanding welfare due date is required
Total Amount of this Member\'s Regular Loan Outstanding should be zero and above.
The next repayment date is required for the outstanding loan
The loan number is required for the outstanding loan
Another member is using this Member Number.
The loan number cannot be zero
Press Send to send all data for all existing meetings or Begin to begin a new meeting.
You will not be able to edit the current meeting after beginning a new meeting.
Press Begin to begin a new meeting.
Can not send information because mobile data or internet connection is not available.
Sorry, you may only edit the date of the most recent meeting in this cycle dated:
The meeting date cannot be modified due to data integrity reasons.
The meeting date has been modified.
The Meeting date cannot be in the future.
The Meeting Date has to be within the current cycle
The Meeting Date has to be later than
The Meeting Date has to be earlier than
Meeting could not be Created to setup the Loans and Savings
Member on data record could not be migrated.
Member of data record was migrated successfully.
An error has occurred. Skipping member on data record
The Data File: could not be located.
This action will delete all the VSLA information in the phone. Are you sure you would like to proceed with the data recovery for
The Region in which the Vsla was registered is required
The number of members in the Vsla Group is required
The Position of the contact person is required
The Phone Number of the contact person is required
The name of the Contact Person is required
Are you sure you want to delete this meeting? If so, tap Done. The following information will be deleted:
Sorry, first delete the most recent meeting in this cycle dated: /%s.
The meeting cannot be deleted. It contains meeting data.
Select the Meeting whose data you want to view.
All meeting data has been sent
You haven\'t sent any data yet.
After sending data, you will be able to review each meeting here.
Be sure to send data after each meeting so you do not lose it.
Set Internet address for the server that will receive data
Set telephone number to call for support

You are currently NOT in Training Mode. Any cycle or meeting information you record will affect the data for your group members. Training Mode is a way to safely practice and explore Ledger Link without affecting your group\'s data. Tap to switch to Training Mode to use practice data without affecting your group\'s data.
You are in Training Mode using practice data. Any data you enter will not affect your group\'s data
There are no active cycles to modify
Select next to modify the cycle
There is more than one cycle currently running. Select the cycle to edit.
Select next to end the cycle
There is more than one unfinished cycle. Select the cycle to end.
Please select the cycle you wish to modify
Ledger Link has suffered an internal error
You are not connected to the internet
This information was added after the cycle started. Here are the interest and fines collected by that day.
There is no cycle that is currently running. A New Cycle will be created.
\% is high. Are you sure you entered the correct interest rate
The Share Price must be positive.
The Share Price can not be less than 100
The Share Price can not be more than 100000
The Maximum Share Quantity is required.
The Maximum Share Quantity must be positive.
The End Date must be after the Start Date
The Interest Rate should be between 1\% and 20\%
The start date of this cycle should be after the share-out date of the previous cycle, which was: %s.
Total amount of Interest collected in Current Cycle so far should be zero and above.
Total amount of Fines collected in Current Cycle so far should be zero and above.
Total amount of the outstanding bank loan in current cycle should be zero and above.
No data connection detected. Please ensure you have an active internet connection
is less than one star, please enter atleast
The selected outstanding welfare has already been paid
If a payment is NOT due and no payment is made, press cancel. If a payment is due but not made enter 0 (zero) for payment amount. After entering payment, review new balance.
Member does not have an outstanding loan.
The member does not have an outstanding loan.
The due date has to be a future date.
The member has no Outstanding Loan.
UGX. Payment made must not exceed
The repayment amount of zero (0 UGX) is not allowed when the loan is not yet due.
The Loan has been edited successfully
You do not have enough money in the box to meet this loan amount.
The new amount should be more than the original amount.
This member’s information was added after the cycle started. Here are
total savings and outstanding loans on that day.
Are you sure you would like to reactivate
System failed to retrieve the member\'s records.
Are you sure you would like to archive this member?
You have not entered the Comments
The value for Cash from Box is invalid.
The value for Cash withdrawn from Bank is invalid.
The value for Loan from Bank is invalid.
The data network is available. You may review the information below then tap Send to send the current meeting and all past meetings.
The data network is available. You may review the information below then tap Send to send the current meeting.
The data network is not available. Move to a place with data network to send meeting data. You can send meeting data later by selecting Meeting from the main menu.
Values for this past meeting cannot be modified at this time
You cannot issue a new loan to
because he does not have a member number
View the date below and tap it to change if it is not the correct meeting date. (You may not select a date in the future.) Press next to begin the meeting.
There was a problem while setting up the meeting
The Current Cycle could not be determined. Please choose a cycle.
Values for past meeting cannot be modified at this time
The Cashbook balances have been saved successfully.
The value for Cash Book Box must be positive.
An internet connection could not be detected. Retrieval of the VSLA Profile will require an internet connection
Please wait as LedgerLink refreshes the test training data...
We weren\'t able to send your registration because of a network problem. We\'ve saved it and will try to send it later.
We weren\'t able to send your registration last time because of a network problem. We\'ve saved it and will try to send it when you sign in now.
No internet connection could be established. Data recovery requires an internet connection
You have not selected any trainings
The selected trainings have been saved successfully
Review and confirm that all information is correct. Press the member’s name to correct an entry. If you wish to review it later, you may

Data import has been completed succesfully.

The Pass Key could not be validated.

If it is not the beginning of a cycle, you will also need to enter the number of stars (shares) bought so far during the current cycle and the amount of loans outstanding for each member. Are you prepared to enter all member and cycle information now? If so you may get started by tapping

Review and confirm that all information is correct. Correct any errors.

You have entered all information about your savings group and the current cycle. You may now use the phone at every meeting to enter savings and loan activity.

You have successfully started a new cycle
The VSLA information could not be downloaded because the remote server could not be reached. Kindly check to ensure that you have an internet connection.
The meeting data was sent successfully
The remote server encountered an internal error. There was no response from the server
